div.opener:
Paid New York
Decr December . 18th 1848 A. G. Welker
Esq. Esquire
Knoxville, Tenn Tennessee .
Dr Dear . Sir
div.p: Your favor of 8th inst instant is at hand concerning draft on Mess Messieurs . N & J Seymour for Ninety 63/100 doll. (90.63/100) on acct account note of J B Morgan which is to his credit

Please bear in mind that the original note of Mr. Morgan ready with exchange on N Y, & on final settlement. You must make him pay for exchange on your remittances. We hope you will be able to collect the balance remaining unpaid, at an early day_
